post.summary: Creates new and updates existing authorizations (advanced version - can be used to create/update all types of authorizations).
post.description:
Creates the provided authorizations to be added in the access control system, updates the provided existing authorizations and returns a list of the new authorization object versions.
The dates and timestamps for the authorizations should always be provided regardless of the time zone.
Create authorization: Either lockId or areaId needs to be set for an authorization. It's not possible to set both IDs at the same time.
Update authorization: It's not possible to change a lockId/areaId

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Authorizations to be created or updated

400.description: Bad request

401.description: Unauthorized (e.g., API key not found, not allowed due to IP whitelist)

404.description: Authorization to be updated not found

409.description: Authorization of medium for the provided lock/area already exists

429.description: Too many requests - daily request limit exceeded

post.description:
Creates an authorization of type 'SIMPLE' (same as using SimpleAuthorizationInfo in POST /authorizations/advanced). If an authorization canâ€™t be created (e.g. already has 8 authorizations), an error will be returned. Be advised that this is only a simplified interface for fulfilling basic authorization needs, a 'SIMPLE' authorization will actually consist of up to 3 AuthorizationInfo elements combined (of type one-day and permanent) within an authorization -> authorization of type 'SIMPLE' will never be part of a response.
The dates and timestamps for the authorizations should always be provided regardless of the time zone.
Either lockId or areaId needs to be set for an authorization. It's not possible to set both IDs at the same time.

400.description: Bad request

401.description: Unauthorized (e.g., API key not found, not allowed due to IP whitelist)

429.description: Too many requests - daily request limit exceeded

get.description: Returns a list of events (only returns events that are max. 7 days old), sorted by event creation timestamp in descending order. Integration environment: 7 day restriction is not enforced, use '2019-04-28T00:00Z' as 'createdAfter' query parameter to get all events.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Filter events that were created after this timestamp (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ). Query parameter is required because clients are encouraged to make a choice what data is actually needed (e.g. when polling this resource with an interval of 10 minutes: (createdAfter = now - 10 minutes) retrieves events which were created in the last 10 minutes.

post.summary: Sends a registration code to the phone and creates all necessary prerequisites if needed.
post.description:
Based on the given phone number this request sends a registration link via SMS for easy installation of the AirKey app. It simplifies the task of creating new mobile app users by implicitly creating new persons, phones and authorizations of type 'SIMPLE' if needed, i.e. it reuses an existing person if found. Please check before if a phone already exists with the given phone number to prevent duplicates (GET /media/phones using the filter phoneNumber). The reason why duplicates are allowed is to be able to create a new phone with an already existing phone number so it is not mandatory to delete an old phone before creating the new phone with the same phone number.
Authorization creation mirrors the behaviour of POST /authorizations/simple. If you need more control consider creating a phone and person with this call and using the advanced authorization interface for creating authorizations.
Either lockId or areaId needs to be set for an authorization. It's not possible to set both IDs at the same time.

400.description: Bad request (e.g., wrong data type supplied)

401.description: Unauthorized (e.g., API key not found, not allowed due to IP whitelist)

429.description: Too many requests - daily request limit exceeded

mediumId.description: Unique identifier of the paired phone (medium)

allOf.description: Model that describes details of an event where a phone was successfully paired.

version.description: Current version number of the area

lockList.description: List of locks that are assigned to the area

Area.description: Model that describes an area defined in the access control system.

areaList.description: List of areas defined in the access control system

AreaPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of areas defined in the access control system used for paging.

version.description: Current version number of the authorization

medium.description: Medium to which this authorization is defined

lock.description: Lock for which the medium is authorized

area.description: Area for which the medium is authorized

createdOn.description: Timestamp when the authorization was created (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision)

updatedOn.description: Timestamp when the authorization was last updated (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision)

synchronizedOn.description: Timestamp when the authorization was last synchronized with the medium (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision)

deletionRequested.description: Is a deletion of the authorization requested or not

Authorization.description: Model that describes an authorization defined in the access control system (NOTE: Either the lock or the area is set, not both).

authorizationCreateList.description: List of medium authorizations to be created for the provided locks/areas

authorizationUpdateList.description: List of medium authorizations to be updated

pushMessage.description: Notification text that will be shown on the phone for new/changed authorizations. Default text will be used if not set.

AuthorizationChange.description: Model that describes two lists of medium authorizations: one list with authorizations to be created in the access control system, the other list with authorizations to be updated.

mediumId.description: Medium to which this authorization should be defined

areaId.description: Area for which the given medium should be authorized. Required when no lock id is set.

lockId.description: Lock for which the given medium should be authorized. Required when no area id is set.

AuthorizationCreate.description: Model that describes an authorization of a medium to be created in the access control system (NOTE: Either the lockId or the areaId must be set, not both).

id.description: Unique identifier of the authorization to be updated

deletionRequested.description: Is a deletion of the authorization requested (true) or should the deletion request be rolled back (false)

AuthorizationDelete.description: Model that describes an authorization of a medium to be updated with regard to its status of deletion request.

AuthorizationInfo.description:
Model that describes details of an authorization. Possible types of authorizations are:
PermanentAuthorizationInfo: describes a permanent authorization with or without an expiration date ("validFromDate", "validToDate")
PeriodicalAuthorizationInfo: describes an authorization with periodic access with or without an expiration date ("periodicalPeriods", "validFromDate", "validToDate")
OneDayAuthorizationInfo: describes a temporary authorization for a day or a period of the day ("validAtDate", "startTime", "endTime")
SimpleAuthorizationInfo: describes an authorization for basic needs, e.g., multi-day-capability, from-to with minute granularity, no gaps, no holiday calendar ("validFrom", "validTo")

AuthorizationPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of authorizations of media defined in the access control system used for paging.

AuthorizationSyncDetails.description: Model that describes synchronization details of an authorization.

mediumId.description: Unique identifier of the synchronized medium

allOf.description: Model that describes details of an event where authorizations were synchronized.

lockId.description: Lock for which the medium was added to the blacklist

mediumId.description: Medium which was added to the blacklist

synchronizedOnLock.description: Signals if the lock needs to be synchronized to consider this blacklist entry appropriately

BlacklistEntry.description: Model that describes an entry in a blacklist defined in the access control system.

allOf.description: Model that describes a card defined in the access control system.

CardPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of cards defined in the access control system used for paging.

temporalCreditEndOfValidity.description: Timestamp of temporal credit validity expiration (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision)

CreditInfo.description: Model that describes the information about available credits needed for modification of authorizations.

accessControlSystemName.description: Name of the access control system

customerNumber.description: Customer number associated with the access control system

createdOn.description: Date when the customer was created (ISO 8601-format compliant date: yyyy-mm-dd)

customerName.description: Name of customer (in case of a company it is the company name, otherwise the name of the private customer)

contactPerson.description: Contact person of the access control system

addressStreet.description: Street as part of the customer's address

addressPostCode.description: Postal code as part of the customer's address

addressCity.description: City as part of the customer's address

addressCountryCode.description: Country code as part of the customer's address (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 format compliant)

correspondenceLanguageCode.description: Language code for correspondences (IETF bcp47 format compliant)

Customer.description: Model that describes data of a customer.

details.description: Further event details (contextual event information, different for every event type)

timestamp.description: Event creation timestamp (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision)

Event.description: Model that describes an event in the access control system.

EventDetails.description:
Model that describes further details of an event in the access control system (different for every event type). Possible types of event details are:
AppPairedEventDetails: describes an event where a phone was successfully paired ("mediumId")
AuthorizationSynchronizedEventDetails: describes an event where authorizations were synchronized ("mediumId", "syncedAuthorizationList")
UnlockingEventDetails: describes an event where a locking component was unlocked ("lockId", "mediumId", "unlockingTimestamp")

EventPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of events logged in the access control system used for paging.

lockId.description: Lock for which the medium should be authorized. Required when no area id is set.

areaId.description: Area for which the medium should be authorized. Required when no lock id is set.

removeAllExistingAuthorizationsForPair.description: Removes all authorizations for the given medium â€“ lock or medium â€“ area pair before creating the given simple authorization (avoids conflict potential which may result in failure).

FixedMediumSimpleAuthorizationCreate.description: Model that is same as SimpleAuthorizationCreate, only with a fixed medium id (canâ€™t be manually set, context dependant retrieval).

version.description: Current version number of the holiday calendar

active.description: Is the holiday calendar currently active or not

holidayCalendarSlots.description: List of holiday calendar slots defining the time of the holidays

HolidayCalendar.description: Model that describes a holiday calendar defined in the access control system.

holidayCalendarList.description: List of holiday calendars defined in the access control system

HolidayCalendarList.description: Model that describes a list of holiday calendars defined in the access control system.

endsOn.description: Day until when the series is valid regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

HolidayCalendarSeries.description: Model that describes a repetitive series of holiday calendar slots defined in a holiday calendar.

endsOn.description: Day until when the series is valid (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

HolidayCalendarSeriesCreate.description: Model that describes a repetitive series of holiday calendar slots to be defined in a holiday calendar.

version.description: Current version number of the holiday calendar slot

slotName.description: Name of the holiday calendar slot (max. 50 characters)

validFrom.description: Holiday calendar slot start time regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

validTo.description: Holiday calendar slot end time regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

series.description: Time series to which this holiday calendar slot is assigned to

seriesSequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of this holiday calendar slot in the time series

HolidayCalendarSlot.description: Model that describes a holiday calendar slot with identifier, version and a defined validity in a holiday calendar.

slotName.description: Name of the holiday calendar slot (max. 50 characters)

validFrom.description: Holiday calendar slot start time regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

validTo.description: Holiday calendar slot end time regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

series.description: Time series to which this holiday calendar slot is assigned to

HolidayCalendarSlotCreate.description: Model that describes a holiday calendar slot to be defined in a holiday calendar.

version.description: Current version number of the holiday calendar slot

slotName.description: Name of the holiday calendar slot

validFrom.description: Holiday calendar slot start time regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

validTo.description: Holiday calendar slot end time regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

series.description: Time series to which this holiday calendar slot is assigned to

seriesSequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of this holiday calendar slot in the time series

deleteFutureSlots.description: Deleting this holiday calendar slot only or also all future slots in the series

HolidayCalendarSlotDelete.description: Model that describes a holiday calendar slot with identifier  that should be deleted in a holiday calendar.

version.description: Current version number of the holiday calendar slot

slotName.description: Name of the holiday calendar slot (max. 50 characters)

validFrom.description: Holiday calendar slot start time regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

validTo.description: Holiday calendar slot end time regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

series.description: Time series to which this holiday calendar slot is assigned to

seriesSequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of this holiday calendar slot in the time series

modifyFutureSlots.description: Updating this holiday calendar slot only or also all future slots in the series

HolidayCalendarSlotUpdate.description: Model that describes a holiday calendar slot with identifier, version and a defined validity that should be updated in a holiday calendar.

version.description: Current version number of the lock

lockDoor.description: Door information associated with the lock

Lock.description: Model that describes a lock defined in the access control system.

location.description: Location of the door which could be an address or GPS coordinates

LockDoor.description: Model that describes the door information associated with a lock.

LockFirmware.description: Model that describes the firmware information of a lock.

lock.description: Locking component with which the list of maintenance tasks is associated

maintenanceTaskList.description: List of different available maintenance tasks

LockMaintenanceTask.description: Model that describes a list of maintenance tasks for a specific locking component in the access control system.

LockPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of locks defined in the access control system used for paging.

lock.description: Lock with which this protocol entry is associated

LockProtocol.description: Model that describes a protocol entry associated with a lock defined in the access control system.

translations.description: Event details translations comprising all requested languages (default only "de-DE")

LockProtocolDetails.description:
Model that describes details of an event logged in the protocol associated with a lock defined in the access control system, e.g., what data were changed on a locking component/medium during an update. The details are presented in form of a short description of the event, which is translated to the requested languages (default only "de-DE"). The fields provide the actual values for most of the placeholders in the translation strings (prefixed with an @ symbol). The actual value for the "@cylinderNumber" placeholder is the "lockIdentifier" which is sent as part of the "SimpleLock" model. Since the actually used attributes vary between different events, the returned details usually only contain a subset of the following attributes:
"areaCylinderAssignmentsSyncSuccessful", "authKeysSyncSuccessful", "batteryStatus", "blacklistSyncSuccessful", "capError", "capVersion", "comment", "cylinderClockInvalid", "cylinderNumber", "cylinderSharing", "cylinderType", "errorCode", "factoryStateAuthKeyRemoved", "factoryStateAuthKeyStored", "from", "holidayCalendarSyncSuccessful", "logSyncSuccessful", "mediumIdentifier", "motorPicVersion", "mPicError", "name", "newCylinderNumber", "number", "oldCylinderNumber", "operatorName", "permanentOpeningSettingsSyncSuccessful", "phone", "phoneNumber", "picError", "picVersion", "proxyMediumIdentifier", "reason", "success", "targetMediumIdentifier", "timeDeltaInSeconds", "timeReconstructedAfterPowerFailure", "timeSynchronized", "to", "unblockingDurationSyncSuccessful", "username", "whitelistSyncSuccessful"
A returned "proxyMediumIdentifier" shows that a phone was used as device for executing this event and it provides this phone's identifier.
For example:
"details": {
   "fields": {
     "batteryStatus": 100,
     "timeSynchronized": {
       "timeDeltaInSeconds": 8,
       "success": true
     }
   },
   "translations": {
     "de-DE": SchlieÃŸkomponente aktualisiert: Uhrzeit aktualisiert (Zeitdifferenz: @timeDeltaInSeconds), Batterie: @batteryStatus)."
   }
}

details.description: Details of the protocol entry event

lockUtcDelta.description: Time difference of locking component regarding UTC

medium.description: Medium which was used as source for this event

operatorName.description: Name of person who was responsible for this event

sourceLock.description: Locking component has verified event or not

sourceMedium.description: Medium has verified event or not

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the event (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision)

LockProtocolEntry.description: Model that describes a protocol entry associated with a lock defined in the access control system.

translations.description: Event type translations comprising all requested languages (default only "de-DE")

LockProtocolEvent.description: Model that describes the type of a protocol entry event associated with a lock defined in the access control system.

LockProtocolPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of lock protocols used for paging.

lockMaintenanceTaskList.description: List of locking components and their associated maintenance tasks

MaintenanceTaskPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of locking components and their maintenance tasks defined in the access control system used for paging.

version.description: Current version number of the medium

lastSynchronizedOn.description: Timestamp of the last synchronization (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ)

releaseDurationExtended.description: Release duration is extended or not

permanentOpeningEnabled.description: Permanent opening is enabled or not

personId.description: Person this medium is assigned to

Medium.description:
Model that describes a medium defined in the access control system. Possible types of media are:
Phone: describes a phone ("appType", "platformVersion", "phoneSettings", "pairingCode", "pairingCodeValidUntil", "phoneNumber", "sentKeyOn")
Card: describes a card

MediumAssignment.description: Model that describes an assignment of a medium to a person in an access control system.

MediumPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of media defined in the access control system used for paging.

validAtDate.description: Date when the authorization is valid regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

startTime.description: Starting time on the day specified by validAtDate, not necessary when the authorization should be valid for the whole day (format: hh:mm)

endTime.description: Ending time on the day specified by validAtDate, max value: 24:00, not necessary when authorization should be valid for the whole day (format: hh:mm)

allOf.description: Model that describes details of a one day authorization.

periodicalPeriods.description: List of periodical periods in which the medium is authorized for a lock or area (max. 28 entries - 4 per week day)

validFromDate.description: Date from when the authorization is valid regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

validToDate.description: Date until when the authorization is valid regardless of the time zone, not necessary if there should be no limit (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

allOf.description: Model that describes details of a periodical authorization.

PeriodicalPeriod.description: Model that describes a periodical period defined in an authorization.

validFromDate.description: Date from when the authorization is valid regardless of the time zone, not necessary if it should always be valid (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

validToDate.description: Date until when the authorization is valid regardless of the time zone, not necessary if it should always be valid (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

allOf.description: Model that describes details of a permanent authorization.

version.description: Current version number of the person

firstName.description: First name of the person (max. 50 characters)

lastName.description: Last name of the person (max. 50 characters)

secondaryIdentification.description: Secondary identification of the person (max. 50 characters)

birthday.description: Birthday (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

countryCode.description: Country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 compliant and case sensitive (ONLY the defined ISO codes are accepted)

correspondenceLanguageCode.description: Language code for correspondences, IETF bcp47 compliant and case sensitive (ONLY the 11 defined language tags are accepted)

Person.description: Model that describes a stored person with identifier and version defined in the access control system.

firstName.description: First name of the person (max. 50 characters)

lastName.description: Last name of the person (max. 50 characters)

secondaryIdentification.description: Secondary identification of the person (max. 50 characters)

birthday.description: Birthday (ISO 8601-format compliant date without time zone: yyyy-mm-dd)

countryCode.description: Country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 compliant and case sensitive (ONLY the defined ISO codes are accepted)

correspondenceLanguageCode.description: Language code for correspondences, IETF bcp47 compliant and case sensitive (ONLY the 11 defined language tags are accepted)

PersonCreate.description: Model that describes a person to be defined in the access control system.

PersonPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of persons defined in the access control system used for paging.

pairingCodeValidUntil.description: Timestamp until when the pairing code is valid (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ)

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the phone starting with '+' followed by 1-49 digits (incl. possible spaces), e.g. +436641234567

sentKeyOn.description: Timestamp when the pairing code was sent to the phone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ)

allOf.description: Model that describes a phone defined in the access control system.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the phone to be created starting with '+' followed by 1-49 digits (incl. possible spaces), e.g. +436641234567)

name.description: Name of the phone to be created (max. 50 characters)

PhoneCreate.description: Model that describes a phone to be defined in an access control system.

PhonePagingList.description: Model that describes a list of phones defined in the access control system used for paging.

mediumLogVisible.description: Log of the medium is visible or not

pinResetTime.description: Timestamp of PIN reset (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ)

PhoneSettings.description: Model that describes the settings of a phone defined in the access control system.

id.description: Unique id of the phone for using an existing one

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the phone to be created starting with '+' followed by 1-49 digits (incl. possible spaces), e.g. +436641234567)

name.description: Name of the phone to be created (max. 50 characters)

SendAKeyPhone.description: Model that describes a phone to be defined in an access control system.

person.description: Person to create / use (the search filter criteria of a person use: 'firstName', 'lastName', and 'secondaryIdentification')

smsText.description: SMS text. Default text will be used if not set.

SendAKeyRequest.description: Model that describes a send-a-key request.

phone.description: Phone (either looked up by the requested one or the created one)

person.description: Same as in request, supplemented with default data / existing data and id

smsText.description: SMS text. Default text will be used if not set.

SendRegistrationCodeRequest.description: Model that describes a send registration code request.

SimpleArea.description: Model that describes an area in a simple form defined in the access control system.

mediumId.description: Medium to which this authorization should be defined

lockId.description: Lock for which the medium should be authorized. Required when no area id is set.

areaId.description: Area for which the medium should be authorized. Required when no lock id is set.

removeAllExistingAuthorizationsForPair.description: Removes all authorizations for the given medium â€“ lock or medium â€“ area pair before creating the given simple authorization (avoids conflict potential which may result in failure).

pushMessage.description: Notification text that will be shown on the phone for new/changed authorizations. Default text will be used if not set.

SimpleAuthorizationCreate.description: Model that describes a simple authorization of a medium to be created in the access control system.

validFrom.description: Date from when the authorization is valid regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

validTo.description: Date until when the authorization is valid regardless of the time zone (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time, without time zone: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm)

allOf.description: Model that describes details of an authorization for basic needs (multi-day-capability, from-to with minute granularity, no gaps, no holiday calendar).

SimpleLock.description: Model that describes a lock in a simple form defined in the access control system.

SimpleMedium.description: Model that describes a medium in a simple form defined in the access control system.

administratorName.description: Name of the administrator who was responsible for this event

userId.description: Unique identifier of the administrator who was responsible for this event

systemProtocolEntry.description: System protocol entry with event details

SystemProtocol.description: Model that describes a system protocol entry in the access control system.

fields.description: Event details value fields using a JSON structure

translations.description: Event details translations comprising all requested languages (default only "de-DE")

SystemProtocolDetails.description:
Model that describes details of an event logged in the system protocol of an access control system, e.g., what activity was performed on which locking component/medium and what data were changed on a locking component/medium during an update. The details are presented in form of a short description of the event, which is translated to the requested languages (default only "de-DE"). The fields provide the actual values for the placeholders in the translation strings (prefixed with an @ symbol). Since the actually used attributes vary between different activities, the returned details usually only contain a subset of the following attributes:
"aco", "amount", "activated", "area", "authorizations", "capError", "capVersion", "city", "clientId", "code", "comment", "companyName", "costActivation", country", "customer", "cylinderNumber", "cylinderType", "deactivationComment", "details", "doorAdditionalInformation", "doorName", "email", "emailNotificationInveral", "endOfValidity", "endOfValidityAfter", "endTime", "fax", "firstname", "isCustom", "isKeyRingLogVisible", "JavaCardAppletVersion", "language", "lastname", "lockingSystemName", "mediumIdentifier", "mediumType", "model", "motorPicVersion", "mPicError", "name", "newEndOfValidity", "newValue", "notesEmailNotification", "number", "oldValue", "operatorName", "packageVersion", "phone", "phoneNumber", "period", "picError", "picVersion", "proxyMediumIdentifier", "reactivationComment", "reason", "reasonForDeactivating", "reasonForReactivating", "requestsPerDay", "startTime", "street", "subcomponent", "title", "translationKey", "tyAfter", "type", "updateEmailNotification", "user", "username", "validFrom", "validTo", "zip"
For example:
"details": {
   "fields": {
     "name": "phone 1",
     "mediumType": "MOBILE_PHONE",      "details": {
       "isInMaintenanceMode": true
     },
     "phoneNumber": "+43123456789",
     "mediumIdentifier": "01A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H"
   },
   "translations": {
     "de-DE": "@mediumType \"@mediumIdentifier\"#{ (@name)}#{ @phoneNumber} wurde erfolgreich bearbeitet."
   }
}

event.description: Type of system protocol entry event

details.description: Details of the system protocol entry event

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the event (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision)

lockIdentifier.description: Identifier of the locking component which was involved in the event, otherwise empty if no locking component was involved

lockId.description: Unique id of the locking component which was involved in the event if it still exists in the access control system, otherwise empty

mediumIdentifier.description: Identifier of the medium which was involved in the event, otherwise empty if no medium was involved,

mediumId.description: Unique id of the medium which was involved in the event if it still exists in the access control system, otherwise empty

SystemProtocolEntry.description: Model that describes a protocol entry of an event that was conducted by an administrator in the access control system.

translations.description: Event type translations comprising all requested languages (default only "de-DE")

SystemProtocolEvent.description: Model that describes the type of a system protocol entry event defined in the access control system.

SystemProtocolPagingList.description: Model that describes a list of system protocols used for paging.

lockId.description: Unique identifier of the unlocked locking component

mediumId.description: Unique identifier of the medium which was used to unlock the locking component. Not set for anonymized events.

unlockingTimestamp.description: Unlocking timestamp, usually different than the event (server) timestamp (ISO 8601-format compliant date with time in UTC, milliseconds precision)

allOf.description: Model that describes details of an event where a locking component was unlocked.
